title: Игры без границ
overview: A large-scale project in which pairs of athletes from all over the world compete to defend the honor of their country: Russia, China, Iran, Belarus, USA, Uzbekistan, Brazil, India, Kazakhstan. They will have to go through vivid, epic and large-scale tests. There are 64 athletes in the season, of which 16 participants represent Russia. All athletes are divided into pairs (male-female), the winning pair will receive the main prize - the championship trophy, as well as 10,000,000 rubles.
